General.Name: Kistos PLC
General.Description: Kistos Holdings Plc, an independent energy company, focuses on development and production opportunities across natural gas basins and energy generation projects in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands. The company's assets include interests in Dutch and the U.K. North Sea, and onshore Netherlands. Kistos Holdings Plc was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
